[Groovy] Class logger

java.lang.Object
  logger

class logger

description:
This class is used to log request, response and other miscellaneous data into a log file or log the datasink into a results file.
Authors:
Diganth Aswath

Constructor Summary
logger(java.lang.Object util)

Initializes the logger class with the uitl object.
 
Method Summary
java.lang.Object captureLogs(java.lang.String logType)

This function can be used to capture logs that are created by SoapUI.
java.lang.Object debug(java.lang.String debug)

Logs debug statements with "Debug:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
java.lang.Object error(java.lang.String error)

Logs error statements with "Error:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
java.lang.Object info(java.lang.String comment)

Logs info statements with "Info:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
java.lang.Object results(java.lang.Object data)

This is an internal function used to write any string value to a result file created by createResultFile().
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
java.lang.Object#wait(), java.lang.Object#wait(long, int), java.lang.Object#wait(long), java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object), java.lang.Object#toString(), java.lang.Object#hashCode(), java.lang.Object#getClass(), java.lang.Object#notify(), java.lang.Object#notifyAll()

logger

logger(java.lang.Object util)
Initializes the logger class with the uitl object.
Parameters:

Method Detail

captureLogs

java.lang.Object captureLogs(java.lang.String logType)
This function can be used to capture logs that are created by SoapUI.
Parameters:
logType - This parameter can have any of the following strings: SoapUI, error, http

debug

java.lang.Object debug(java.lang.String debug)
Logs debug statements with "Debug:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
Parameters:
debug - Debug string that needs to be saved in the log file.

error

java.lang.Object error(java.lang.String error)
Logs error statements with "Error:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
Parameters:
error - Error string that needs to be saved in the log file.

info

java.lang.Object info(java.lang.String comment)
Logs info statements with "Info:" tag in the log.log file created using createLogFile()
Parameters:
comment - Information string that needs to be saved in the log file.

results

java.lang.Object results(java.lang.Object data)
This is an internal function used to write any string value to a result file created by createResultFile().
Parameters:
data - String that needs to be appended to the file.
